content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Electricity generator at position (5.5, 0.5)
Consists of steam engine (position x=5.5 y=0.5) and offshore pump (position x=-7.5 y=25.5) connected through a pipe group (position x=5.5 y=7.5)

### Copper plate mine at position (52.0, -80.0)
Consists of following entities
- Furnace (position x=52.0 y=-84.0)
- Furnace (position x=52.0 y=-82.0)
- Furnace (position x=52.0 y=-80.0)

### Iron plate mine at position (52.0, -82.0)
Consists of following entities
- Furnace (position x=52.0 y=-82.0)

### Stone brick factory at position (62.0, -54.0)
Consists of following entities
- Furnace (position x=62.0 y=-54.0)

### Lab at unknown position
Consists of a lab with automation science pack input

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when placing entities
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placement
- Check if the entity is in the inventory before placing

### Errors when connecting entities
- Ensure the target object is supported before attempting connection
- Check if the entities are close enough to connect

### Errors when accessing entity attributes
- Ensure the entity has the attribute before attempting access
- Check the entity type before accessing attributes

### Errors when working with fluids
- Ensure the fluid system is properly set up before attempting fluid operations
- Check if the fluid box is full before attempting to add or remove fluids

### Errors when working with power networks
- Ensure the generator is connected to the power network before attempting to use it
- Check if the neighbours are properly connected to the power network

### Errors when researching technologies
- Ensure the lab has power before attempting research
- Check if the lab input is properly set up before attempting research
